title: Coordinate with a Third-Party Security Vendor
description: A large music festival requires additional security beyond the in-house team, so a third-party security firm has been hired.

tasks.description: Share the event's security plan and post orders with the vendor's management.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent securely sends the security plan documents to the vendor.

tasks.description: Obtain a list of all vendor staff who will be working the event for credentialing.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives the staff list from the vendor.

tasks.description: Arrange a pre-event briefing between the in-house security manager and the vendor's on-site supervisor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent schedules a meeting to align on protocols and chain of command.
